form.helperUmbrellaEvent: Note. An umbrella event must be created before you can add subevents to it.

infoTextInfoLanguages.course: Select the languages used for entering course information.
infoTextInfoLanguages.event: Select the languages used for entering event information.

infoTextInLanguages.course: Choose the languages used in the course.
infoTextInLanguages.event: Choose the languages used in the event.

form.infoTextType1: Select the type of event. Is it an event or a course? The event is a one-time event and starts at a specific time, while the course may, as a rule, have several occurrences.
form.infoTextType2: The choice of event type affects the choices made later in the input form.
form.labelHasUmbrella: This event has an umbrella event.

labelInfoUrl.course: URL of the course home page {{langText}}
labelInfoUrl.event: URL of the event home page {{langText}}

form.labelIsUmbrella: This event is an umbrella event.
form.labelProvider: Event organizer (if different than the publisher)

placeholderDescription.course: Enter a description of the course
placeholderDescription.event: Enter a description of the event

placeholderInfoUrl.course: Enter the URL of the course home page
placeholderInfoUrl.event: Enter the URL of the event home page

placeholderProvider.ar: Enter the event organizer's name in Arabic
placeholderProvider.en: Enter the event organizer's name in English
placeholderProvider.fi: Enter the event organizer's name in Finnish
placeholderProvider.ru: Enter the event organizer's name in Russian
placeholderProvider.sv: Enter the event organizer's name in Swedish
placeholderProvider.zh_hans: Enter the event organizer's name in Chinese

placeholderShortDescription.course: Enter a short description of the course
placeholderShortDescription.event: Enter a short description of the event

date.future: This date must be in the future

string.date: This field must be a valid date
string.email: This field must be a valid email
string.max: This field can be up to {{max}} characters long
string.min: This field must be at least {{min}} characters long
string.time: Time must be given in the following format hh:mm
string.url: This field must be a valid URL
